Name: Recon Oculoid
Description: This is a Mount Imagine that not only increases Speed when riding but also offers unique skills for a different experience.
Description$english: This is a Mount Imagine that not only increases Speed when riding but also offers unique skills for a different experience.
Description2$english: A floating eye-type Mount Imagine. It floats in mid-air through magical power and moves incredibly smoothly. Contrary to appearances, it is easy to maintain balance while riding it, and once accustomed, it becomes very enjoyable.
